name: GUARDY GIRLS
summary: Three amazing girls--the far-too-strong Silvia, the gun-totin', bullet-blastin' Laurie, and the scientific magical girl Fumi--have formed the Guardy Girls, a brand new team of heroes! They're faced with a rogues gallery of wacky, off-kilter villains--and fellow do-gooders, too! It's a grand way to kick off the Girls' daunting, amazing dream of a hero run!
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 原作: 勝鬨スタジオ
  • 音响监督: 大室正勝
  • 音响: ダックスプロダクション
  • 音乐制作: Juvenile
  • 动画制作: 勝鬨スタジオ
  • 上映年度: 2022年10月14日
